dev.eternalformula.api.ui

Class UIElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.eternalformula.api.ui.UIElement
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EFButton, EFLabel, UIContainer

    public abstract class UIElement
extends java.lang.Object
    The UIElement is the foundation of the EF RPG API's UI system.
    UIElements come in a variety of forms - buttons, textfields, sliders,
    and everything in between. They are extremely powerful, and the EF API RPG
    provides a wide variety of UIElements by default.
    Since:
    Alpha 0.0.4 (SNAPSHOT-2.0)

      • onMouseClicked

        public abstract void onMouseClicked(int x,
                                    int y,
                                    int button)
        Handles mouse clicking on the UIElement.
        Note that this will not call if active is set to false.
        Parameters:
        x - The x location of the click (UI units)
        y - The y location of the click (UI units)
        button - The mouse button used during the click.

      • onMouseReleased

        public abstract void onMouseReleased(int x,
                                     int y,
                                     int button)
        Handles when the mouse releases.
        Note that this will not call if active is set to false.
        Parameters:
        x - The x location of the release (UI units)
        y - The y location of the release (UI units)
        button - The mouse button used during the click.

      • onMouseHovered

        public abstract void onMouseHovered(int x,
                                    int y)
        Handles when the mouse is hovered on the point (x, y).
        Parameters:
        x - The x position of the point
        y - The y position of the point
